/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy over the road. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the otherwise tranquil setting. In the distance, a building with a distinctive curved roof stands out, its architecture hinting at the cultural context of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue sky. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of nature and architecture, a characteristic feature of Beijing's urban landscape.
